version_description:
1. Start / stop recording with volume up / volume down buttons or compatible bluetooth remote controls**.
2. Choose default video stabilization mode**.
3. Added support for external displays connected via lightning-to-HDMI/VGA adaptors.

** Needs to be enabled in 'advanced settings'.

1. Start / stop recording with volume up / volume down buttons or compatible bluetooth remote controls**.
2. Choose default video stabilization mode**.
3. Added support for external displays connected via lightning-to-HDMI/VGA adaptors.

** Needs to be enabled in 'advanced settings'.

1. Start / stop recording with volume up / volume down buttons or compatible bluetooth remote controls**.
2. Choose default video stabilization mode**.
3. Added support for external displays connected via lightning-to-HDMI/VGA adaptors.

** Needs to be enabled in 'advanced settings'.

• Support for iPhone X / 8 / 8+
• Dual-camera support for iPhone X / 8+ / 7+
• Support for front (selfie) camera
• Support for HEVC encoding (iPhone 7 and newer, with iOS 11)
• 2.4:1 anamorphic adaptors: video-desqueezing and 2592x1080 output for 1080p
• Bug fixes
